instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message: There is no water damage on the board. When i put to sleep and after 5 minutes it doesnt wak up. Must reset smc to boot it again. Already tried SMC reballing and there is no result.

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message:
Discard a software issue frist.
Test with USB macOS.

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message: If you close the lid and open it back in less than 5 min, machine resumes normal?

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message: Yes, even sometimes after 5 minutes it starts. But usually it is failing.

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message:
The image/backlight don't come back, or machine remains in sleep state?
Test USB activity, or Caps Lock reaction.

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message: machine, because caps led not turning ok too

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message: If you press power button (not SMC reset), still no reaction?

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message: will check this point tomorrow, thanks

threads.title: 820-00840 not waking up
threads.message:
This happens only when you put in suspend closing the lid?
Or it happens when machine goes to sleep because not in use too?
